original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes at 328.60/80 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed at 328.60/80 to the US dollar on Friday, from 328.75/80 the previous day, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.06.2025 closed at 13.80/14.10 percent from 14.20/35 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 closed at 14.20/40 percent from 14.35/50 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 closed at 14.35/45 percent from 14.55/60 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 closed at 14.55/65 percent from 14.60/80 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 closed at 14.10/50 percent, up from 14.40/50 percent. (Colombo/Nov24/2023)
